cds::queue::MSQueue< gc::hzp_gc, T, TRAITS, ALLOCATOR > Class Template Reference

Michael's Hazard Pointer queue. More...

#include <msqueue_hzp.h>

Detailed Description

template<typename T, class TRAITS, class ALLOCATOR>
class cds::queue::MSQueue< gc::hzp_gc, T, TRAITS, ALLOCATOR >

Michael's Hazard Pointer queue.

Source:
  • [1998] Maged Michael, Michael Scott "Simple, fast, and practical non-blocking and blocking concurrent queue algorithms"
  • [2002] Maged M.Michael "Safe memory reclamation for dynamic lock-freeobjects using atomic reads and writes"
  • [2003] Maged M.Michael "Hazard Pointers: Safe memory reclamation for lock-free objects"
Template parameters:
  • T Type of data saved in queue's node
  • TRAITS Traits class, see cds::queue::traits
  • ALLOCATOR Memory allocator template
Interface: see Queue common interface.
